attributes.action: Take notice of the petitions on this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As can be seen by this site, numerous people have voiced their opinions on a vast array of subjects.  Unfortunately, this Government only seems to want to offer lip-service to democracy and not take into account those that appoint them.
Take notice of us or it'll be P45 time soon...

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
